text:
Courtyard Oahu North Shore to celebrate its grand opening on August 29   
Aug 21, 2015 eTN   
LAIE, Hawaii – Offering visitors to Oahu’s legendary North Shore a new set of accommodations, Courtyard Oahu North Shore will celebrate its grand opening on Saturday, August 29, 2015. The 144-room beachside hotel is located adjacent to the Polynesian Cultural Center in the country town of Laie and is the second Courtyard by Marriott on Oahu. 
Considered a destination hotel, Courtyard Oahu North Shore features well-appointed, modern hotel rooms with free Wi-Fi access, mini-fridges and flat-screen TVs. Suites also come equipped with microwaves. The property offers an on-site restaurant, The Bistro, featuring American fare; an 80,000-square-foot waterfall swimming pool and spa; two meeting rooms; and fitness center. A highlight of the hotel is its dynamic lobby with flexible seating for working and relaxing, contemporary design, and interactive GoBoard® touchscreen providing up-to-the-minute news, weather and local information. 
“We’re excited to celebrate the grand opening of Oahu’s newest hotel with the Courtyard Oahu North Shore,” said Director of Sales Milton Lafitaga. “We’ve combined style and comfort with innovative technology to appeal to today’s travelers looking for an authentic Hawaiian experience away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.” 
From couples to families, Courtyard Oahu North Shore offers something for everyone with its on-site amenities and convenient location to area attractions, golf, legendary beaches and surf spots, farms stands and more.
